Name: Flowing Starlight in the Iris
QuestDesc: After you escaped from Honami City, Chisa, who had pushed herself to the brink of overclocking more than once, received treatment at the Black Shores. You've been apart ever since. Now, it's time to visit her again. For both of you, this will be a new beginning.

Chapters.Title: Wait for Chisa to complete her treatment

Dialogues.Speaker: Ria
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome back, {PlayerName}. Are you here to check on Chisa?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ria
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chisa's been moved to a sealed treatment chamber. She's under close observation and receiving phased therapeutic support.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ria
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Her body's been running under Overclocked strain for quite some time; some of her vitals aren't in great shape. Simply put… she's holding on, but her body is clearly exhausted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ria
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That said, we've started identifying some promising treatment paths. Early response looks good. We're not going to get back to full strength overnight, but with a little time, she should recover steadily. Nothing critical at this point.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ria
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then I'll get back to analyzing her readings! Overall, things are moving in the right direction. Just give us a bit more time, and she'll be alright.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With Chisa's treatment over, you once again return to the Black Shores...

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, {PlayerName}. Perfect timing. There's something you need to know.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since we took charge of the Honami Sonoro Sphere, we've been noticing some changes on the inside—

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The link between Honami and the real world is stabilizing, and the city's time flow is almost in sync.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But scans from Tethys indicate that much of the recent frequency exchanges weren't passing through this rift.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meaning it could either just be a misreading due to overlapping data, or... there's another access point to the Honami Sonoro Sphere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: On top of that, the city's buzzing with unidentified phenomena and unconfirmed hazard zones. We'll continue to monitor them closely and run further analysis.

Options.PlotLineKey: By the way, how's Chisa doing?

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She's just completed her treatment. Everything seems to be all right. Her Rabelle's Curve is within normal parameters, and there are no significant lingering Overclocking symptoms.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That said, I don't recommend repeating what happened in Honami. That level of Resonance strain is unsustainable.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, excuse me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Yes. Mm-hmm. Got it. {Male=He;Female=She}'s with me right now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I just got a call that Chisa submitted an itinerary not long ago and left for Honami alone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She didn't specify. All she wrote was "I want to go back."

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can find her guide KU-Roro in the Haven of Sprouts. It may know something.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll go check it out. Knowing Chisa, she usually doesn't act without purpose.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some time later, you return to the Black Shores to visit Chisa. Valentina tells you that the connection between Honami's Sonoro and the real world is stabilizing. Chisa has completed her treatment and shows no serious lingering Overclocking symptoms. However, she recently went back to Honami alone for reasons unknown. Her guide, KU-Shosho, might know more.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anything else you'd like to know? As long as it's within my authority, I can answer.

Options.PlotLineKey: About Chisa's stay at the Black Shores...

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After Honami was devastated, energy from the Lament sealed the entire city into a unique Sonoro Sphere like congealed amber. Its time flow was slowed down compared to the rest of the world.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A similar case would be Mt. Firmament. Being on the inside for a day means up to a hundred days might have passed on the outside.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it's not permanent. As Honami's connection to reality grows stronger, the flow of time begins to restore itself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You getting sucked into Honami through that rift has got Shorekeeper worried sick, and she's been closely monitoring everything that's going on over there since.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good thing is, at that point, Honami's time flow was no longer that different from the real world. So to us, you were only gone for just a bit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While she was recovering, Chisa applied for partial access to the Black Shores database, mainly to learn general knowledge and modern trends.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We also saw her strolling around the living area and taking a look at the facilities occasionally, just like a lot of the New Branches when they first get here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The KU-Roro responsible for taking care of her can fill you in if you want to know more.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sumika is a member of the Black Shores who went M.I.A. many years ago. We dispatched a team on a search and rescue, but nothing solid came of it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The report Chisa submitted to us has detailed Sumika's operations and engagements in Honami.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She was one of the most outstanding researchers of the Error Cell, and an elite Bloom Bearer who made the Black Shores proud.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Stellar Matrix will forever remember her noble pursuit of truth.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anything else you'd like to know? As long as it's within my authority, I can answer.

Options.PlotLineKey: About Chisa's stay at the Black Shores...

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The KU-Roro responsible for taking care of her can fill you in if you want to know more.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sumika is a member of the Black Shores who went M.I.A. many years ago. We dispatched a team on a search and rescue, but nothing solid came of it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The report Chisa submitted to us has detailed Sumika's operations and engagements in Honami.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She was one of the most outstanding researchers of the Error Cell, and an elite Bloom Bearer who made the Black Shores proud.

Dialogues.Speaker: Valentina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Stellar Matrix will forever remember her noble pursuit of truth.

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now then, I believe it's safe to say I can finally go for a recharge...

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Shosho
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Kuku... Why did she leave in such a hurry? Should I clean this up?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Shosho
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, Bloom Bearer. Ms. Chisa has been gone for some time now.

Options.PlotLineKey: Did you notice anything strange when she left?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Shosho
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She was only visiting the nearby facilities, like she normally does. But I had noticed her emotional readings had been low for a while.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Shosho
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She used to enjoy reading the archives, but in the past few days, I saw her staring off into the distance or performing kirigami.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Shosho
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, yes. Making small art crafts by cutting paper. There are still a few left on this table. She usually always cleaned up afterward, but this time...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (These look like scraps from all the paper cutting. And this one here is a half-finished tower... It looks kind of familiar.)

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Shosho
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After submitting her leave, I even asked her if she would like someone to accompany her on her travels, to which she refused.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Shosho
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please. I leave Ms. Chisa in your care.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: KU-Shosho explains that Chisa usually rests at the Haven of Sprouts, but has been in low spirits lately. She left in a hurry without even cleaning up her kirigami on the table. This unusual behavior prompts you to search for her in Honami.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Aetherfin shows you a holographic reconstruction of the event that occurred here—

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You see a girl looking off into the distance, her eyes lost in the blue sky. What could she be thinking?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chisa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is something wrong, {PlayerName}? Why did you turn back?

Options.PlotLineKey: I heard a voice on the radio just now.
I heard someone calling my name.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chisa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A voice from the radio? But isn't it broken?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chisa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You did? I'm right next to you, but... I don't think I heard anything.

Options.PlotLineKey: You sure you didn't hear anything strange?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chisa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. You must be exhausted. Should we go back to the cafe?

Options.PlotLineKey: I guess I could use some rest.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I don't think I was imagining it... that voice.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Strangely, Chisa, standing beside you, doesn't hear it. But you're certain it wasn't your imagination.
